_comment: _data/projects.json - Sample project data following the roadmap schema

projects.title: Cardiac Scaling
projects.description: Explores various methods of scaling cardiac dimensions to body size, including allometric scaling. This is the companion site to a letter to the editors in JASE (2025).

projects.title: Fetal Echo Z-scores
projects.description: Uses various publications to provide fetal cardiac z-scores based on EGA or other biometric measurements.

projects.title: PISA Thing
projects.description: Interactive calculator for proximal isovelocity surface area (PISA) and regurgitant flow. Also has a related calculator for MR RF via the volumetric method.

projects.title: LV Mass Calculator
projects.description: Calculates LV mass via the ASE formula then looks at various normal values for both pediatric and adults.

projects.title: Dilated Aorta Finder (Dilated AF)
projects.description: Uses both the 2015 ASE GLs and the newer NORRE height-indexed data to identify dilated aortic dimensions in adults.

projects.title: Prosthetic Heart Valves Normal Values
projects.description: Based on the 2024 JASE Guidelines; values for surgical and trans-catheter valves in all positions.
